jobDescription: Job Locations US-CA-Anaheim  Posted Date 1 hour ago(6/8/2018 12:30 PM)  Requisition ID 2018-8395  Position Category Administrative/Clerical/Payroll/HR/Accounting  Internal Reference 743  Internal Code 3 Ind1  Company/Division Transdev Services  Overview  Transdev, formerly Veolia Transportation, is the largest private sector operator of multiple modes of passenger transit in North America, providing bus, rail, paratransit, shuttle, sedan and taxi services. We manage over 200 transportation contracts for cities, transit authorities and airports, providing safe and sustainable mobility solutions. Our mission is to improve public transportation, to enhance quality of life and combat global warming.  Plans, organizes and coordinates the workflow of data for all reporting required for the National Transit Database. ResponsibilitiesCompiles data from multiple sources within the companyInputs collected data into company systemsGenerate reports as required by the department in accordance with outlined standardsMaintains confidentiality of all information Other duties as required. QualificationsEducation, Licensing, and Certifications Required:High school diploma or equivalent, such as GED, required.Education, Licensing, and Certifications Preferred:Some college studied preferredExperience:1 year or more of relevant experience requiredSkills and Knowledge Required:Working knowledge of database systems and ability to perform data entry via keyboardWorking knowledge of Microsoft Word and ExcelAbility to use and master specialty transit related software programsGood written and oral communication skillsTravel requirement (as a percent):
